Diana Page (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-etinye ihe nkiri sitere na South Africa mana ọ bi na Istanbul, Turkey ugbu a. N'ịchọpụta ahụmịhe nke ịgagharị n'etiti ụlọ abụọ a, ihe osise Page na-emetụta echiche nke ijikọ ụwa ọnụ na ụdị ndụ na-akwagharị akwagharị. Site na ihe eserese, arụmọrụ, ntinye, na vidiyo, Page na-enyocha gburugburu obodo ọ bi dị ka ọnọdụ mmetụta uche yana nke anụ ahụ.

N'afọ 2022, ihe ngosi nke Page, Walking on a rim of light, nke gụnyere ihe osise ndị dabeere na foto na mbipụta dijitalụ, gosipụtara na Oliewenhuis Art Museum (Reservoir) site na 24 Febụwarị ruo 10 Eprel 2022.
Page nwetara nzere BA Honours site na Mahadum Natal, 1986, HDE site na Machịum Cape Town, 1987, na Master na Fine Arts site na Maazị Rhodes, 1992.
